source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_00<tab>Haermaga is eager to offer Costa Del Sol the protection of the Sunshine Savior.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

コスタ・デル・ソルのヘールマガは、冒険者たちにヒーロー士の活動を始めてほしいようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_01<tab>Reeve informs Haermaga that he has asked you to help him learn the ins and outs of helping people in need. The chaperone is keen on this idea, and revises Reeve's tasks, instructing him to keep watch over the people celebrating on the northeastern shores of Costa Del Sol. There, you are to offer advice on who is most in need of a heroic rescue, and how exactly Reeve should go about it.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

ヘールマガから、ヒーロー士の活動を始めるよう頼まれた。紅蓮祭会場の浜辺で「紅蓮祭実行委員ボドゥフォアン」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_02<tab>With your steady hand to guide him, Reeve is able to leave the shores of Costa Del Sol even safer than they were when he arrived. Every savior needs rest, however, and Beaudefoin soon arrives to take over watch duty. Reeve is eager to share tidings of his success with Haermaga, and asks you to accompany him.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_02<tab>浜辺でヒーロー士として活動した。報告のため「紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_03<tab>Haermaga is pleased with Reeve's progress, and explains that his costume is modeled after the phoenix of legend. Just like that legendary bird, the chaperone hopes that Reeve can be reborn, and thus recover his lost confidence. This hope is soon tested when a shark appears on Costa Del Sol, and Reeve drives it back in a display of bravery that could move even the most cold-hearted miser. After the fight, Reeve stands dumbfounded at his own actions─he may require your help one final time to be led in the right direction.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_03<tab>浜辺に襲来した鮫は、リーヴの活躍で撃退された。戦いを終えた「リーヴ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_04<tab>Your arrival returns Reeve to his senses, and he is at last able to meet the eyes of the people he has just saved. While he looks to have suffered no more than surface wounds, Haermaga instructs him to visit the healer's tent. The chaperone asks you to stay behind to keep watch for any further fiends.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_04<tab>リーヴは怪我の手当てのため移動した。彼を待つため、「紅蓮祭実行委員長ヘールマガ」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_05<tab>Your watch is uneventful, and Reeve returns with mask doffed and a smile on his face. For your part on bringing the young adventurer into his own, Haermaga makes you an honorary Sunshin Savior, rewarding you with the selfsame costume that gave Reeve the confidence for heroics. You are now free to enjoy the Moonfire Faire and all its pleasures, for the savior of the sands watches over you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SEQ_05<tab>かくして常夏の浜辺に、頼れるヒーロー士が誕生した。どのような危機が訪れようとも、きっと彼がいる限り平和は守られるだろう。残りの期間も、紅蓮祭で賑わう常夏のビーチを満喫しよう！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, under your guidance, I know I can make the Sunshine Savior the talk of Costa Del Sol!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、このあともよろしく頼むぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>It seems our most pressing problem has been solved, eh? How're you feeling, Reeve? Up for the task ahead?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_001<tab>さて、これで不審者問題は解決だ。
そろそろ活動開始といきたいが……

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>どうだリーヴ、
ヒーロー士としての心構えはできたか？
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_001<tab>どうだリーヴ、
ヒーロー士としての心構えはできたか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_002<tab>About that... As much as I'd like to jump right into the thick of things, there's is one doubt yet niggling at my conscience.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_002<tab>おう！　任せろ！
と言いたいけどな……
実は、少し不安があるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_002<tab>The incident with the merchant made me realize that it's one matter to want to aid those in need, but another matter entirely to know who <var 1A 02 /var>wants<var 1A 01 /var> to be aided.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_002<tab>さっき気づいたけど、要望が明確な「依頼人」ならまだしも、
困ってる人を見分けて適切に声をかけるってのは、案外難しい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_003<tab>Fortunately, I have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> by my side─they seem to have an uncanny knack for finding troubled souls. I've asked <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to take me under <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> wing for a bit, and I hope to be a quick study.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_003<tab>だから、<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>が俺をサポートしてくれるなら、
ぜひそこらへんの判断に力を借りたいぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>That's a capital idea, lad. Every adventurer has a few stories of being rewarded with scorn instead of coin. Strange as it sounds, a helping hand must be deft besides.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_004<tab>確かにな、下手に声をかけては拒絶される可能性もあるし、
助けが必要かどうかの即時判断なんて、
ベテランでも難儀するもんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_005<tab>Well then, let's revise your tasks, eh? Give you a chance to sharpen that nose of yours to the scent of unrest.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_005<tab>ふむ……ならばそのあたりも含め、
あらためてお前さんたちの任務を確認しておこう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>Why don't you stand watch over the revelers gathered at the northeastern shores. If you spot trouble brewing, I want you to put a lid on it before it spills over.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_006<tab>来場者が集まるコスタ・デル・ソル北東の島を見守り、
トラブルの兆候を確認したら、すぐに対応してもらいたい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_007<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will attend you in a supervisory capacity. Before leaping into action, ask <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> for advice on who to talk with and what to say. <var 08 E905 ((She'll)) ((He'll)) /var> guide you well, I reckon.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_007<tab>ただし、リーヴが独断で動くのはまだ難しいだろう。
そこで、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>が指揮官役となり、
誰にどう声をかけるべきか、助言を与えてやってくれ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_008<tab>Now then, off with you! The battlefield of adventure awaits─make me proud, you two, make me proud!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_008<tab>よし、じゃあさっそく、
浜辺という名の戦場に赴こうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_009<tab>A guild member by the name of Beaudefoin is standing by to be relived of his duty. Speak with him first, then show the realm the measure of a Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_009<tab>今は実行委員の「ボドゥフォアン」が臨時で浜辺を見てるから、
奴と話して交代してくれ。
では頼むぞ、ヒーロー士たちよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_011<tab>This is it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's time to prove myself worthy of being the Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_011<tab>いよいよ活動開始だ！
ヒーロー士の名に恥じない働きをしなきゃな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>Beaudefoin should be patrolling the northeastern shores, assuming he hasn't caught a nap under some shade somewhere. Relieve him of his post, and I hope to soon hear tidings of your success!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_012<tab>ボドゥフォアンはすぐそこの浜辺にいるはずだから、
話しかけて交代してやってくれ。
リーヴのこと、頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>Why if it isn't the Sunshine Savior, protector of the summer sands! Please, please, I release the beaches of Costa Del Sol to your stewardship!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_013<tab>おーいえぇい、話は聞いてるぜヒーロー士さんたちよ！
さっそく俺と交代して、ビーチを見守ってくれや！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>The following event cannot be skipped. You may wish to cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_SYSTEM_100_013<tab>このイベントはスキップすることができないため、
コンテンツファインダー申請中の場合などは、ご注意ください。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q50_200_013<tab>Relieve Beaudefoin of his duty?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q50_200_013<tab>ヒーロー士の活動を開始しますか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_014<tab>Ah, yes, before I go, allow me to furnish you with this linkpearl. A crucial tool for a duo of strapping guardians such as yourselves. Godsspeed, saviors!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_014<tab>そうだ、ふたりで仕事するなら、
このリンクパールを渡しとくぜ……連携に役立ててくれ。
じゃ、よろしくな！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_015<tab>And now our watch begins! Go on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, tell me what you see. If there is trouble lurking about, the Sunshine Savior shall rise to action!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_015<tab>それじゃ<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、
もしヒーロー士が必要そうな場所があったら指示してくれ！
俺が！　すぐに！！　駆けつけるぜ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q1_000_000<tab>What do you see?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q1_000_000<tab>何が気になる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_001<tab>A young Mi'qote lad and his lady companion look like a sellsword just stole their lunch.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_001<tab>落ち込んだ様子のミコッテ族の青年と女の子の姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_002<tab>A surly pirate lass is sizing up a nearby man. Quite intensely, by the looks of it.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A1_000_002<tab>怪しげな女海賊が男の様子を窺っている姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RFHULTIA_000_020<tab>Grrgg...failed again. I'll never master the Nimble Warrior course. At this rate, I'll have to wait until next summer...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RFHULTIA_000_020<tab>うう……またダメだった。
高難度ルート、なんて難しいんだ……。
やっぱり、俺には魔城の制覇なんて無理なのか……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_021<tab>I know you can do it, Brother!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_021<tab>お兄ちゃん、元気出して！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>Hmm...but I've given you all the encouragement I can. If only there was someone else who knew just what to say to lift your spirits.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RMAJHA_000_022<tab>う～ん、私の言葉だけじゃダメかも？
ほかにも誰か、いないかな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_023<tab>That boy looks absolutely crestfallen. From what I can gather, he's having some difficulties with the Nimble Warrior course. I know what it's like when success keep slipping out of one's grasp...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_023<tab>なにやら、えらく落ち込んだ男がいるな。
聞こえたかぎりだと、常夏の魔城を攻略できなくて、
嘆いてるみたいだが……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q2_000_000<tab>What should Reeve do?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q2_000_000<tab>どんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_001<tab>Show him how a Sunshine Savior does it!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_001<tab>魔城攻略のお手本を見せてやれ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_002<tab>Give him some words of encouragement!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_002<tab>青年を励ましてやれ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_003<tab>Leave him be. He'll learn more by doing it himself.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A2_000_003<tab>他人が関わるべきじゃない、放置で！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_030<tab>You want <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> to attempt the Nimble Warrior course? I'm equal to the challenge, you can be sure, but that would mean leaving the others unprotected.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_030<tab>それ、今から常夏の魔城を登れってことか？
できなくはないが、俺らがいま浜辺を離れるのはどうだろう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_031<tab>If you ask me, it looks like the lad needs a few words of encouragement to set him straight. Yes, that should do the trick. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, wait here─I'll be back in a flash!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_031<tab>それよりあの子、
ほかに元気づけてくれる人がいないか、探してるみたいだ。
俺、ちょっと行ってくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_032<tab>You read my mind, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Encouragement is my forte! A few carefully placed words should lift this lad over the obstacle in his path. Wait here─I'll be back in a flash!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_032<tab>おう、任せろ！
あの子、ほかに元気づけてくれる人を探してるみたいだしな。
やる気を取り戻せるよう、なんとか励ましてみるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_033<tab>I see the wisdom in that, truly I do. But I can't help but recall my own struggles─where would I have ended up if you and Master Haermaga didn't come along with a few kinds words?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_033<tab><var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>の言うとおり、
自力で立ち直るべきなのは間違いないな。
だがあの様子だと、あいつしばらくあのままだぞ？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_034<tab>Surely it couldn't hurt, could it? Wait here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I'll be back before you can think of a reason to object!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_034<tab>あの子もほかに元気づけてくれる人を探してるみたいだし、
俺、ちょっと行ってくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_035<tab>The pair were thankful enough, and the boy seemed once again eager to tackle the Nimble Warrior course. All in all, a success for the Sunshine Savior!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_035<tab>ありがとうって、お礼を言われたよ。
兄のほうも立ち直ったみたいだし、行ってよかったな！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_040<tab>Bloody Carvallain, thinks he's too good for a pirate, does he?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_040<tab>へたれのカルヴァランめ、
相変わらず、すかした態度しやがって……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_041<tab>I'll make him see, I will. If I just ask him all nicelike... “Fancy a stroll on the beach, Carvallain?” or somesuch... Bah, he'll just think I'm itchin' fer a duel!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_000_041<tab>きょ、今日こそ声を……
だけど、何て言えばいいんだい！？

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_100_041<tab>「奇遇だねえ、あたしとサシで少し浜辺を歩かないかい？」
……いやいや、これじゃあ決闘の申し込みだと思われちまう！
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_RHOSWEN_100_041<tab>「奇遇だねえ、あたしとサシで少し浜辺を歩かないかい？」
……いやいや、これじゃあ決闘の申し込みだと思われちまう！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_042<tab>She's mumbling to herself an awful lot. The menacing provocations of a pirate, no doubt. What do you think, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_042<tab>ブツブツ独りごと言ってる怪しい奴がいるな。
見た感じ海賊っぽいけど、どうする？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q3_000_000<tab>What should Reeve do?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q3_000_000<tab>リーヴにどんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_001<tab>Just ask if something's the matter.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_001<tab>「何かお困りですか？」と聞いてみよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_002<tab>Don't worry about her. Worry about the man!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_002<tab>女性にではなく、男性に注意を促せ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_003<tab>We should watch from a safe distance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A3_000_003<tab>あたたかい目で見守ろう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_043<tab>I think you have the right of it here. Truth be told, this has the look of something dangerous. I'd best insinuate myself into the matter before it takes a turn.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_043<tab>了解した！
さすがにちょっと怪しいし、それとなく声をかけてみるぜ！

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_043<tab>了解した！
あんなにじーっと見られてるなんて、ただごとじゃないもんな。
警戒したほうがいいって伝えてくるぜ。
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_043<tab>了解した！
あんなにじーっと見られてるなんて、ただごとじゃないもんな。
警戒したほうがいいって伝えてくるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_044<tab>She left in a hurry, with nary a word of explanation. Did I interrupt something? Ah, well, there was no violence, so as far as I'm concerned, the Sunshine Savior can mark down a victory in his ledger.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_044<tab>よくわからんが、去ってったな。
なぜか少し罪悪感があるが……
何も問題は起きなかったし、良しとしようぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_047<tab>Are you certain? This has the scent of danger...or is that just the food stall? Ah, no matter, I shall trust your advice. It's what you're here for, after all!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_047<tab>見るからに怪しいと思うが、いいのか？
……わかった、ここは<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>を信じて、
何も言わず見守ってみるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_048<tab>Hmm, I'm beginning to understand. She wishes to say something, but it's caught in her throat like a bone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_048<tab>なるほど、なんとなくわかってきた。
つまりアレだ、声をかけたいがかけられない……アレだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_049<tab>...Ah, she's given up. Perhaps she, too, cannot bear to face another with a bare face. Is that why pirates hide their faces with patches and bandanas?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_049<tab>あー……声かけられなかったか……
彼女も、素顔では素直に人と会話できないのかもしれないな。
少しはわかるぜ、その気持ち……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_050<tab>Alas, I have but a single mask, so I couldn't have been of help even if I wanted. Regardless, it seems your instincts served us well. Not that I had any doubt they would!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_050<tab>しかしこれは、俺が割り込んでたら台無しだったろうな。
<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>は全部わかったうえで、見守る指示を出したのか？
さすが、すげえ洞察力だぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_060<tab>Well, all I see are smiles in this area. What about over there?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_060<tab>このあたりにはもう、困ってそうな人はいないみたいだ。
反対側に行ってみようぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q4_000_000<tab>What do you see?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q4_000_000<tab>何が気になる？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_001<tab>A group of revelers are entranced by the Nimble Warrior course.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_001<tab>紅蓮祭の来場客たちが、常夏の魔城を眺めている姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_002<tab>A muscular fellow is slumped over on the ground.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A4_000_002<tab>筋肉質な男たちが地面にへたり込んでいる姿

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_070<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)Go on, jump! Jump like your life depends on it!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_070<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)よっしゃ行け、跳べ！
根性見せろーー！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_071<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)You'll never make it from there...! Watch out or you'll eat sand!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_071<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)あっ、その位置からじゃ届かな……
言わんこっちゃねえ、落ちる……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBB04724_000_072<tab>(-Faire Reveler-)Oh no, are you all right? That looked painful! I think I heard a snap...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBB04724_000_072<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)えっ、あいつ大丈夫？
なんかもがいてるような……
あれ、マズくない！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q5_000_000<tab>What should Reeve do?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q5_000_000<tab>リーヴにどんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_001<tab>Pay attention, Reeve!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_001<tab>リーヴ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_002<tab>Help them!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A5_000_002<tab>救助を！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_073<tab>I'm coming!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_073<tab>……ッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_074<tab>Phew... Before I knew it, I was under the surface...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_074<tab>ごめん、<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>の指示を聞いてから動くべきだったけど、
気づいたら海に飛び込んでた……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_075<tab>Some water got into my mask, and I thought I'd meet my end then and there... But somehow I found my bearings, and I was able to bring that man to shore! Fortune favors the reckless, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_075<tab>マスクに海水が入って死ぬかと思ったが……
運よく助けられて、本当によかったよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBC04724_000_076<tab>(Muscle-bound Roegadyn)<huff> <huff> ...
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBC04724_000_076<tab>(-筋肉質な男たち-)ぜえ、ぜえ……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_077<tab>Are you all right, sir?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_077<tab>おじちゃんたち、大丈夫？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBD04724_000_078<tab>(Muscle-bound Roegadyn)My muscles cushioned the brunt of the fall, but... Gods, I can barely see straight...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBD04724_000_078<tab>(-筋肉質なルガディン族-)まだだ、俺の筋肉は、まだ死んじゃいない……。
だが……うう、目が回る……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_079<tab>Oh no, that's not good! Perhaps a member of the guild can help!?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_079<tab>大変！
紅蓮祭実行委員の方を呼んできましょうか！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_080<tab>I suppose this heat and intense exercise mix as well as oil and water. Should I go for help?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_080<tab>どうやら、運動のしすぎで参ってるみたいだな。
暑いし、無理もない……
<var 08 E905 ((アネキ)) ((アニキ)) /var>、彼らを救護したほうがいいか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q6_000_000<tab>What should Reeve do?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q6_000_000<tab>リーヴにどんな指示を出す？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_001<tab>Tell him to find a spot of shade to rest in.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_001<tab>休憩を入れるように伝えよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_002<tab>Tell him to drink plenty of fluids.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_002<tab>水分をとるよう伝えよう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_003<tab>Look at all those muscles. He'll be fine.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A6_000_003<tab>筋肉もりもりだし、大丈夫だろう

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_082<tab>You're quite right! Even the strongest of us will wither before the sun without water and shade. I'll go and tell him as much!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_082<tab>ああ、了解した！
暑い中で汗を流し続けるのは危険だからな、
水分をとって休むよう、勧めてくるぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_083<tab>I see that, but what use are muscles before the pitiless rays of the sun? At the very least, I should recommend a short constitutional.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_083<tab>いくら鍛えてても、
常夏のこの島で運動し続けるのは危険じゃないか？
ぶっ倒れてからじゃ遅いし、ちょっと俺、休憩を薦めてくるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_089<tab>I had a word with the man, and he insists that there's nothing to worry about. Still, my duty is to dig out the roots of trouble before they break soil, so in that respect I consider this a success.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_089<tab>ふぅ、なんとか話を聞いてくれた。
大したことじゃないかもしれないが、
トラブルの未然対処も俺らの仕事だからな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_090<tab>Speaking of which, I see no further signs of distress along the beach. I believe our relief should be along soon, and not a moment too soon. I can't bear this stifling heat for much longer...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_090<tab>見た感じ、いまは困ってる人がいなさそうだ。
俺らも少しだけ、ひと息入れるかい？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_091<tab>As bad as this heat is, I'd rather spend an eternity baking under the sun than another moment under those waves... Every time I breathed, more water filled my lungs... I wager at least one of the hells is deep beneath the ocean surface.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_091<tab>ふぅ、暑い……実は、さっき海に入ったときから、
マスクが水浸しで……息苦しくて……蒸れて……。
なかなかに地獄だったんですよ……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_092<tab>I'm grateful to be alive and well, and with a few feats of derring-do under my belt besides. That's in no small part thanks to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─your sound guidance led me to take action where I might have been paralyzed by doubt.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_092<tab>しかし今回の件、俺ひとりじゃ、
的確な対処は難しかったでしょう。
カニみたいに浜辺を右往左往するだけだったかもしれません。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_093<tab>I have Haermaga's costume to thank, as well. It may very well have some special power to turn the timid into the lionhearted...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_093<tab>堂々と臨めたのはきっと、このスーツの力と……
何より、見守ってくれていたあなたのおかげですよ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_094<tab>Impressive work, you two! I say you've earned some rest, eh? Allow me to watch over our patrons─I can only hope my stretch is half as eventful as yours was!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_094<tab>ひゃっは～、お疲れさん、頑張ってるみたいじゃねえか！
働き詰めでヘールマガが心配してたから、一度戻ったらどうだ？
その間は俺が見回っておくからよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_096<tab>Much appreciated! Now, I suspect Master Haermaga will want to hear of our successes here. Let's go and make our report.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_096<tab>お気遣いありがとうございます。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_096<tab>では、お言葉に甘えて……
報告がてら、ヘールマガの旦那のところへ向かいましょうか。
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_096<tab>では、お言葉に甘えて……
報告がてら、ヘールマガの旦那のところへ向かいましょうか。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_100<tab>I know I yet have a long journey ahead of me, but I hope that I've taken at least a few bounding strides toward my goal.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_100<tab>こんなへっぽこでも、ヒーロー士として、
ふさわしい働きができたんでしょうか……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>Ah, there you are! The whispers of your deeds precede you─revelers up and down the beaches are taken with your bravery.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_101<tab>おう、ご苦労さん！
お前さんたちの活動、話題になってるぜ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>The one you saved even came to offer his personal thanks. By all accounts, your lost confidence has been restored and then some. I suspect you're ready to set off on your own, but I wouldn't force it upon you if you've got lingering reservations.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_102<tab>助けられた来場客が、わざわざ感謝を伝えに来てくれたりもした。
リーヴよ、お前さんも自信がついただろう。
そろそろひとりで大丈夫だと思うが、どうだ？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_103<tab>I... Well, truth be told, I wouldn't have been able to do it without <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s help. And this mask, of course─donning it makes me forget the meaning of the word “impossible.”
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_103<tab>マスクがあれば、なんとかやれそうではありますが……。
いえ、やはり俺なんか……
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんのサポートがあってこそです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>Hmm... You have to realize that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> won't be around forever, so inclined to adventuring abroad as <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> is. A savior needs to be able to carry their burden alone if they aim to be trusted by others.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_104<tab>ふむ……。
しかし、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>はいつまでも居られまい。
ヒーロー士はあくまでお前なんだ、気張ってもらわんとな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_105<tab>Maybe we should start with this aversion to letting others see your face. Something tells me you weren't born this way. Am I right?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_105<tab>そもそもリーヴ、お前さんどうして素顔だと消極的なんだ？
顔を出すこと自体には抵抗がないようだし、
生来の性格とも思えないが……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_106<tab>Aye. It happened when I was just getting my feet wet as an adventurer, you see. It was a routine job, even for an initiate...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_106<tab>確かに俺、冒険者になりたての頃は、
普通に素顔で活動していました。
ですが……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_107<tab>We were guarding a merchant caravan, which naturally drew the attention of a terrible, slavering beast. Instead of sticking it with a spear like I was supposed to, I was the first one knocked out.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_107<tab>俺、仲間とともに隊商の護衛任務を請け負ったことがあるんです。
そのとき、巨大な魔物に急襲され……
守り手のはずの俺は、真っ先に気絶させられました。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_108<tab>When I came to, I saw that my partner had been dealt a grievous wound and the caravan was in shambles─the job was an utter failure. For a blessing, none lost their lives, but <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> lost all standing in the eyes of my allies and employers.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_108<tab>気づいたら仲間が重傷を負っていて、依頼も失敗。
死者こそ出ませんでしたが、
あとで仲間や依頼人から言われたんです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_109<tab>They blamed me for the injuries and damage to their goods, and rightfully so. The memory of their scornful gazes is etched in my mind, and I see them every time I look another in the eyes.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_109<tab>「役立たず、お前のせいで傷ついた、お前のせいで大損害だ」
事実そのとおりですから、言われて当然ですよね。
それ以来、自分が情けなくて、人の目が怖くなり……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_110<tab>So you coped with the memory by hiding behind a helm. It's starting to make sense...
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_110<tab>それでお前さんは、顔を隠して仕事をするようになった、と。
なるほどな……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_111<tab>You know, Reeve, there's a bit of meaning behind this design I neglected to mention before, but it seems luck's given me the perfect chance to fix that mistake.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_111<tab>……なあリーヴ、お前さんが着ているスーツの、
もうひとつの「ご利益」を信じてみないか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab>See, it was meant to evoke the image of the phoenix. That legendary bird that serves as the symbol of rebirth, rising from the ashes over and over again in a blaze of rebirth.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_112<tab>そのスーツ、実は不死鳥フェニックスをモチーフとしていてな。
……転生の炎をまとうその鳥は、「復活と再生」の象徴だ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_113<tab>Seeing your triumphs as a Sunshine Savior has made me sure that that same fire burns within you. And when it's flames are stoked, you'll be reborn, every bit the brave soul you were before.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_113<tab>それを着てヒーロー士の仕事をこなしたお前さんには、
きっと転生の炎が宿ってるはずさ。
必ず復活し、自信を再生させられる……そう信じるんだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_114<tab>All this time, I was wrapped in the phoenix's embrace... Yes, if there's a chance I too might be born anew, I must continue!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_114<tab>そうですね、この仕事を通して立ち直れるなら……
どんなにへっぽこでも、やるしかない、か……。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_115<tab>I'm heading back to the beach─this time without a mask!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_115<tab>俺、もう一度浜辺に行ってきます……今度はマスクなしで！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_116<tab>Something on your mind? Did I lay it on too thick?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_116<tab>何か言いたげだな……クサいってか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_117<tab>When you get to my age, you can't help but light fires under arses that need 'em. You get what I'm saying, eh?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_117<tab>まあわかるが……俺もおっさんだからな、若いのが燻ってると、
つい余計なことを言いたくなっちまうわけだ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_118<tab>And that lad needed something a little hotter than a piddling campfire, so I gave him a raging bonfire! Just had to work with the embers that were already there─that burning desire of his to help the downtrodden.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_118<tab>心が折れたってんなら、火にくべて鍛え直しゃいいだけさ。
そのための種火を、アイツはすでに持ってるはずなんだ。
「人を助けたい」って熱意をよ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_119<tab>(-Distant Scream-)M-m-m-monster!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOBA04724_000_119<tab>(-浜辺からの悲鳴-)か、か、か、怪物だーーーーー！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_500<tab>Curses...powerless again!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_500<tab>くそっ、俺はまた……また、何も……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_501<tab>Stand down, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If someone jumps to his rescue again, that fire I just lit will fade away. We need to think of a way to help him that doesn't involve doing all the heavy lifting.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_501<tab>待ってくれ！
いま他人が助けたら、あいつはまた無力感を味わうことになる！
どうにか手出しをせず、支えてやれないか……！？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q30_000_000<tab>What will you shout?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_Q30_000_000<tab>何と声をかける？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_001<tab>The Sunshine Saviors never back down!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_001<tab>負けるな、ヒーロー士！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_002<tab>Rise from the ashes of defeat, and be reborn!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_002<tab>不屈の心で立ち上がれッ！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_003<tab>No monster can stand against Reeve!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_003<tab>お前ならやれる！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_004<tab>If Reeve can't do it, no one can!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_A30_000_004<tab>がーんばれッ！！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_600<tab>(-Moonfire Reveler-)<var 08 E905 ((She's)) ((He's)) /var> right! Your <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> Sunshine Savior! So save us!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_600<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)そうだ、あんたならできる！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_601<tab>(-Moonfire Reveler-)Give this beast the what for!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_MOB04724_000_601<tab>(-紅蓮祭の来場客-)やれるだけ、ぶちかましてやんなッ！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_602<tab>They really...have faith in <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_602<tab>こんな俺を……信じてくれるのか……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_603<tab>I can't let them down. I must uphold the reputation of the Sunshine Saviors!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_603<tab>なら……
俺も全身全霊で応えなきゃ、なぁッ……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_604<tab>Gyaaaaaahhh!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_604<tab>うおおおおおおおッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_605<tab>Bathe in the flames of my rebirth! I shall rise above your ashes a new man!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_605<tab>これが俺の転生の炎……
フェニックスインパクトォォォォォッ！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_120<tab>The lad looks unharmed─a small miracle, all things considered.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_120<tab>見たところ、大きな怪我はないようだな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_121<tab>I only saw from a distance, but that was enough to take in the spectacle. Reeve really made stew out of that shark, didn't he? I would have never thought he was capable just a short while ago.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_121<tab>遠目から見えたが……あの巨大鮫をひとりで倒すたぁ、
すげえじゃねえか！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_122<tab>That was so scary, but so exciting at the same time! I'll have to write this down in my diary!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_122<tab>食べられちゃう！？
って、すっごくドキドキした！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_123<tab>Thanks to your bravery, no one came to harm. Thank you, thank you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_123<tab>クロが無事で、よかった……！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TKEBBE_100_123<tab>クロちゃん、だいじょうぶ……？
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_TKEBBE_100_123<tab>クロちゃん、だいじょうぶ……？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_124<tab>あー、ええと……大丈夫だったか？
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_124<tab>あー、ええと……大丈夫だったか？

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_125<tab>That was so scary, but so exciting at the same time! I'll have to write this down in my diary!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_KHLOEALIAPOH_000_125<tab>怖かったけど、すっごくドキドキした！
お兄ちゃんのこと、日記に書いておくね！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_126<tab>Thanks to your bravery, no one came to harm. Thank you, thank you!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_ZHLOEALIAPOH_000_126<tab>おかげで、この子にも怪我はありませんでした。
本当にありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_127<tab>But I didn't─ Ah, never mind that. You're most welcome, of course.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_127<tab>俺はなにも……いや……
こちらこそ、ありがとう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_128<tab>I'm not sure what to call what just happened, but the word “miracle” comes to mind. Did I truly drive back that bloodthirsty shark?
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_128<tab>怪我はなかった、か……よかった。
まぐれどころか奇跡みたいなものですが……
誰も怪我しないうちに撃退できて、本当によかった。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_129<tab>That you did, and without a single hair on our guests coming to harm. As for yourself, I see nothing more than scratches, but it'd be best to get you looked at just in case.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_129<tab>ふん、まぐれなもんか！
そもそもやれると判断したから、ヒーロー士を任せたんだ。
ちゃんと、お前の実力だろうよ。

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_129<tab>とはいえ手傷は負っただろう？
ボドゥフォアンに案内してもらって、手当を受けてくるといい。
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_100_129<tab>とはいえ手傷は負っただろう？
ボドゥフォアンに案内してもらって、手当を受けてくるといい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_131<tab>You stay, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We should keep an eye on things, lest any other seaborne predators decide on being bold today.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_131<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、俺たちはこの島で待っていよう。
念のための見張りも兼ねてな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_140<tab>Ah, you've returned. With the sun on your face and wind in your hair, no less.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_140<tab>ようリーヴ、戻ったか。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_141<tab>Thanks to you two, talk of the Adventurers' Guild is on the lips of everyone in Costa Del Sol. As far as I'm concerned, we can consider the Sunshine Savior a rousing success and a boon for the guild.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_141<tab>今回の件、お前さんたちのおかげで、
冒険者ギルドの活躍をアピールできた。
結果論だが、広報活動としての紅蓮祭は大成功と言っていい。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_142<tab>Reeve here deserves a standing ovation for the bravery he displayed. Taking down a shark of that size and keeping the younglings is a feat very few can boast of, and puts you among very esteemed company.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_142<tab>つまりリーヴよ、お前さんの働きがでかかったってことだ。
咄嗟に子供をかばって魔物に立ち向かうなんざ、
誰もができることじゃない、見事だったぞ。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_143<tab>As my vision dimmed, I heard <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> call out to me. It was <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> words that delivered me from the brink, and allowed me to go further still.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_143<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの声、
倒れかけたあのとき、はっきりと聞こえました。
立ち上がれたのは間違いなく、あなたのおかげです。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_144<tab>They might call me the Sunshine Savior, but you're the true hero of the day. You've given me the courage to go on alone, and for that there is no way I can repay you.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_144<tab>浜辺の守護者がヒーロー士だというなら、
真のヒーローは、ずっと俺を見守ってくれたあなたですよ。
この先はきっと、ひとりでもやっていける……本当にありがとう。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_145<tab>Indeed our savior had a savior of his own. A fact we're all grateful for, to be sure.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_145<tab>なるほど、リーヴを見守った、もうひとりの守護者か。
確かに、そうだな。

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_146<tab>I'm of a mind to make you an honorary Sunshine Savior, suit and all. Wear it well, and don't ask me how many more of these I have stashed away.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_146<tab>ならば<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、紅蓮祭実行委員は、
あんたを「名誉ヒーロー士」として讃えさせてもらおう。
今回の報酬には、リーヴと同じスーツを進呈するぜ！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_147<tab>Now, I encourage you to forget your worries and take in your fill of the festivities, for the Moonfire Faire is safe so long as Reeve here stands as your guardian!
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_HAERMAGA_000_147<tab>紅蓮祭はまだまだ続く……残りの期間、
今度は来場客として、ゆっくり紅蓮祭を楽しんでくれよな！

source:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_147<tab>それじゃ、俺はもう一度見回りに行ってきます。
大丈夫、たとえ何が来ようとも、浜辺の平和は……
target:
TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_100_147<tab>それじゃ、俺はもう一度見回りに行ってきます。
大丈夫、たとえ何が来ようとも、浜辺の平和は……

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_200_147<tab>俺が！　絶対に！！　護ってみせますから！！！
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_200_147<tab>俺が！　絶対に！！　護ってみせますから！！！

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_095<tab>
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_095<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_124<tab>
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_REEVE_000_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_130<tab>Allow me to accompany him. 'Twould be a shame if the savior of the sands fell victim to the sun after so great a deed.
target: TEXT_FESSUM902_04724_BEAUDEFOIN_000_130<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
